name: Verify fields displayed after clicking Apply button for "Full Name:" -- @1.3

steps.name: Given I am on the Career landing page
When I click on the dropdown and select "Software Department"
And I wait for the job listings to load
Then I click the Apply button for the "Ruby Developer" job
Then I should see a new page for filling job application details
And I should see "Full Name:" displayed

fullName: Verify fields displayed after clicking the Apply button for Ruby Developer: Verify fields displayed after clicking Apply button for "Full Name:"

labels.value: Verify fields displayed after clicking the Apply button for Ruby Developer
